articles.title: Large section of Green Line to shut for repairs for half of December
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> The Green Line's downtown stops, entire E Branch, and much of the B Branch will be closed for 15 days. The Orange Line is also affected.

The post Large section of Green Line to shut for repairs for half of December appeared first on Boston.com.
